reviews.review_msg: He doesn't work at SFU anymore (I wonder why) but it's so obvious the reviews below are fake. His current reviews at the other university is a 2.7/5 average on a good day.

One of the most passionate people I've ever encountered. Michael makes course learning go beyond the curriculum and brings in current examples. He's super helpful if you see him outside of classand gives you a really good idea of what direction to take with your papers. Can't say enough good things about Markwick.
